topics.body:
A really, really awkward time to bring this up, but my boyfriend's family has a "fundraiser":http://www.youcaring.com/wendy-villatoro-397747 so the father can be buried in his homeland of El Salvador.

I'm planning to donate some. I'm not expecting hundreds of dollars (or really any) but I thought that I'd post it here anyway.
